clean:
(:action clean_underpants
      :parameters (?u - underpants)
      :precondition (and (dirty ?u))
      :effect (and (clean ?u) (not (dirty ?u)))
)
```

2. Using underpants as garden ties:
```pddl
(:action wear_underpants
      :parameters (?u - underpants ?c - child)
      :precondition (and (clean ?u))
      :effect (and (wearing ?c ?u) (not (clean ?u)))
)
```

6. Donating underpants:
```pddl
use:
(:action use_as_garden_ties
      :parameters (?u - underpants)
      :precondition (and (clean ?u))
      :effect (and (used_as_garden_ties ?u) (not (clean ?u)))
)
```

3. Making a craft item from underpants:
```pddl
(:action use_as_stuffing
      :parameters (?u - underpants)
      :precondition (and (clean ?u))
      :effect (and (used_as_stuffing ?u) (not (clean ?u)))
)
```

5. Wearing underpants:
```pddl
make:
(:action make_craft_item
      :parameters (?u - underpants ?s - scissors)
      :precondition (and (clean ?u) (available ?s))
      :effect (and (craft_item ?u) (not (clean ?u)))
)
```
